---
title: "Mobile Stations"
---

## Kia Forte

A [Kenwood TM-710GA](rigs.qmd#kenwood-tm-710ga) is used in this vehicle for FM (VHF & UHF) voice communications.
The rig also beacons APRS packets as W3TM-1.
I usually have it configured with APRS voice alert.

## Honda CRV

A [Yaesu FTM-400XDR](rigs.qmd#yaesu-FTM-400xdr) is used in this vehicle for FM (VHF & UHF) voice communications.
The rig also beacons APRS packets as W3TM-2.
I usually have it configured with APRS voice alert.
